","sentences":"Our flight was cancelled.
^^我们的航班取消了。^^
I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
^^恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。^^
You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
^^你只能打电话给约翰取消了。^^
","relWords":"n.
cancellation: 取消；删除

","synos":"vt.
[计]取消；删去：recall, call it off

n.
[计]取消，撤销：withdrawal, revocation

","synos":"n.

^^2013.12 CET6 第三套 听力题^^
"},"$:/CET6_3/gorgeous_100":{"title":"$:/CET6_3/gorgeous_100","word":"gorgeous","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-CET6_3/Word}}","created":"20220419132431272","transCn":"adj. 华丽的， 灿烂的， 绚丽的； 令人十分愉快的， 极好的

","sentences":"a gorgeous cake
^^漂亮的蛋糕^^

","relWords":"adv.

","synos":"adj.
华丽的，灿烂的；极好的：brilliant, wonderful, excellent, famous, super
"},"$:/CET6_3/vital_1000":{"title":"$:/CET6_3/vital_1000","word":"vital","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-CET6_3/Word}}","created":"20220419132431395","transCn":"adj. 生死攸关的， 极其重要的； 生命的， 有生命力的
","usphone":"'vaɪtl","remMethod":"vit(生命) ＋ al → 事关生命的 → 生死攸关的","phrases":"vital part: 要害部位
vital energy: 生命力
vital force: n. 生机；生命力
vital capacity: [医]肺活量
vital function: 重要作用；生命机能
vital statistics: 人口动态统计；生命的统计资料
vital interest: 切身利益；重大利益
vital point: 要点
vital sign: 生命征；生命迹象
","sentences":"The work she does is absolutely vital.
^^她所做的工作至关重要。^^
It is vital to be honest with your children.
^^对自己的孩子坦诚十分重要。^^
The tourist industry is of vital importance to the national economy.
^^旅游业对国家的经济至关重要。^^
Richardson played a vital role in the team’s success.
^^理查森对球队的成功起了极重要的作用。^^
The samples could give scientists vital information about long-term changes in the earth’s atmosphere.
^^这些样本可以给科学家提供关于地球大气长期变化的极其重要的资料。^^
","relWords":"adv.
vitally: 极其；紧要地；生死攸关地

n.
vitality: 活力，生气；生命力，生动性
vitalism: [生物] 活力论；[生物] 生机说
vitalist: 活力论者
vitalization: 赋予生命
vitalness: 充满活力

vt.
vitalize: 赋予…生命；激发；使有生气

","synos":"adj.
至关重要的；生死攸关的；有活力的：dynamic, life-or-death
","realExamSentences":"...a vital part of China’s plan to operate five basses on Antarctica...
^^2016.12 CET6 第一套 阅读理解^^
...innovation is a vital contributing factor to business success...
^^2016.12 CET6 第一套 写作题^^
...and establishing who is responsible for raising them will also be vital for the future of climate-vulnerable countries...
^^2016.12 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...This is vital for climate-vulnerable nations...
^^2016.12 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...Your vital account information lives on the second track...
^^2015.6 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^
...I don't think it's vital to label GM ingredients in food...
^^2015.6 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...not only at a vital but also at a spiritual level...
^^2015.6 CET6 第一套 阅读理解^^
...They are a vital part of an array of data that we use to assess if we're doing well or doing badly...
^^2015.6 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^
...and its efforts to conquer the gender gap impart a vital lesson-though not the lesson the Swedes had in mind...
^^2014.6 CET6 第一套 阅读理解^^
...And it is vital that once an institution claims to be particularly good at something...
^^2014.12 CET6 第一套 阅读理解^^
...then a vital ingredient of the American self-image as a can-do...
^^2013.6 CET6 第一套 阅读理解^^
...But the transmission from poor quality radios was slightly distorted and the accents of the Spanish speaking controllers were so strong that the pilots misunderstood a vital instruction...
^^2013.12 CET6 第三套 听力题^^
...for certificates do play a vital role when students look for a decent job...
^^2011.6 CET6 undefined 写作题^^
...it is vital that you have a personal vision of where you are headed and what you value...
^^2011.12 CET6 undefined 阅读理解^^
...and he highlights how vital it is for leaders to first personally manage themselves if they are to enjoy any hope of outstanding success in their work environments...
^^2011.12 CET6 undefined 阅读理解^^
"},"$:/CET6_3/eccentric_1001":{"title":"$:/CET6_3/eccentric_1001","word":"eccentric","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-CET6_3/Word}}","created":"20220419132431395","transCn":"adj. 古怪的，怪癖的，异乎寻常的

^^内西姑妈总是有点古怪。^^

","usphone":"mæs","phrases":"rock mass: 岩体；岩块，岩块体；岩石层

","sentences":"a mass protest
^^大规模的抗议^^
weapons of mass destruction
^^大规模杀伤性武器^^
the problem of mass unemployment
^^大批人失业的问题^^
","relWords":"adj.
massive: 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的

adv.

n.
massif: 山丘；断层块；大厦
massiveness: 沉重；巨大，大块；大量

vt.

","synos":"n.
块，团；群众，民众；大量，众多：piece, block, lots of, wealth, ocean, sea
adj.
群众的，民众的；大规模的，集中的：concentrated, intensive, wholesale
vi.

","realExamSentences":"...What can be done about mass unemployment...
^^2016.6 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^
...is why claims that we face huge structural problems have been multiplying: they offer a reason to do nothing about the mass unemployment that is crippling out economy and our society...
^^2016.6 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^

...stripping cartons of their branding will trigger no mass movement to quit...
^^2016.12 CET6 第一套 阅读理解^^
...new technologies that are building upon existing technology have not found their footing well enough to appeal to a mass audience...
^^2016.12 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...mass imprisonment has come to define America--a country...
^^2015.6 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...which is defined by its mass and velocity...
^^2015.12 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...many experts warned of mass starvation in developing nations where populations were expanding faster than crop production...
^^2013.6 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^
...People who sleep less than 7 hours a night tend to have a higher body mass index than people who sleep more...
^^2008.12 CET6 undefined 阅读理解^^
"},"$:/CET6_3/detect_1007":{"title":"$:/CET6_3/detect_1007","word":"detect","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-CET6_3/Word}}","created":"20220419132431396","transCn":"vt. 察觉， 发觉； 侦查出
